パッケージ
org.apache.hadoop.metrics2の使用

  • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2を使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2
    Metrics 2.0
      Overview Getting Started Configuration Metrics Filtering Metrics Instrumentation Strategy Migration from previous system Overview This package provides a framework for metrics instrumentation and publication.
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.filter
    Builtin metrics filters (to be used in metrics config files)
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.lib
    A collection of library classes for implementing metrics sources
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.sink
    Builtin metrics sinks
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.util
    General helpers for implementing source and sinks
  • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2により使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.metrics2のクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AbstractMetric
    The immutable metric
    MetricsCollector
    The metrics collector interface
    MetricsInfo
    Interface to provide immutable metainfo for metrics.
    MetricsPlugin
    The plugin interface for the metrics framework
    MetricsRecord
    An immutable snapshot of metrics with a timestamp
    MetricsRecordBuilder
    The metrics record builder interface
    MetricsSink
    The metrics sink interface.
    MetricsSource
    The source of metrics information.
    MetricsSystem
    The metrics system interface.
    MetricsSystemMXBean
    The JMX interface to the metrics system
    MetricsTag
    Immutable tag for metrics (for grouping on host/queue/username etc.)
    MetricsVisitor
    A visitor interface for metrics
  • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.filterにより使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.metrics2のクラス 
    クラスと説明
    MetricsFilter
    The metrics filter interface.
    MetricsPlugin
    The plugin interface for the metrics framework
  • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.libにより使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.metrics2のクラス
